publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3328 Brian Adam: The Death of Kathleen Cory-That the Parliament notes with sadness the recent death of the family tree pioneer, Kathleen Cory, while commemorating her magnificent contribution to the study of family history in Scotland, namely her ground-breaking book, Tracing Your Scottish Ancestry.

S1M-3328 Brian Adam: The Death of Kathleen Coryâ€”That the Parliament notes with sadness the recent death of the family tree pioneer, Kathleen Cory, while commemorating her magnificent contribution to the study of family history in Scotland, namely her ground-breaking book, Tracing Your Scottish Ancestry.Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Bruce Crawford*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Christine Grahame*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr George Reid*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr John McAllion*, Michael Russell*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Irene McGugan*
S1M-3328 The Death of Kathleen Cory (lodged on 29 August 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*
